message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today.  I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  Given its value, I'm asking for $15,000.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to accept that price?
